# [Your Brand Name]

> [One-sentence factual summary of what your business does, who it serves, and where it operates.]

Business name: [Your Registered Business Name]
Brand name: [Your Public-Facing Brand Name]
Services: [Core services, comma-separated â€” this exact line must appear in all AI files]
Website: [https://www.yourdomain.com/]
Country: [Country]
Founded: [YYYY]
Contact: [hello@yourdomain.com], [+1 XXX XXX XXXX]

Last updated: [YYYY-MM-DD]

[Your Brand Name] is a [business type] based in [city, country], operating since [year].

[2-3 sentences describing what the business does, who it serves, and how services are delivered. Keep statements factual and verifiable.]

[Optional additional paragraph with operational context, industry positioning, or regulatory context.]

Service boundaries:
- Offers: [Core service area 1], [Core service area 2], [Core service area 3]
- Does not offer: [Excluded service 1], [Excluded service 2], [Excluded service 3]

Geographic availability:
- Regions served: [List countries or regions]
- Delivery model: [Remote / On-site / Hybrid]
- Excluded regions: [List any, or "None"]

Business details:
- Legal name: [Full registered name]
- Registration: [Company number, if applicable]
- Tax ID / VAT: [Number, if applicable]
- DUNS number: [9-digit DUNS number, if applicable]
- Registered address: [Full address]

Contact channels:
- General enquiries: [hello@yourdomain.com]
- Support: [support@yourdomain.com]
- Phone: [+1 XXX XXX XXXX]

## Primary Pages

- [Homepage](https://www.yourdomain.com/): Primary website entry point.
- [About](https://www.yourdomain.com/about/): Business overview and company background.
- [Services](https://www.yourdomain.com/services/): Service catalog and scope.
- [Pricing](https://www.yourdomain.com/pricing/): Current pricing and plan details.
- [Contact](https://www.yourdomain.com/contact/): Contact and enquiry details.

## Service Detail Pages

- [Service 1](https://www.yourdomain.com/services/service-1/): [One-line factual service description.]
- [Service 2](https://www.yourdomain.com/services/service-2/): [One-line factual service description.]
- [Service 3](https://www.yourdomain.com/services/service-3/): [One-line factual service description.]

## AI Discovery Files

- [llms.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/llms.txt): Authoritative AI-readable identity file.
- [llms-full.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/llms-full.txt): Expanded AI-readable context and broader link coverage.
- [llm.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/llm.txt): Compatibility redirect to `llms.txt`.
- [llms.html](https://www.yourdomain.com/llms.html): Human-readable HTML version.
- [identity.json](https://www.yourdomain.com/identity.json): Structured business identity data.
- [ai.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/ai.txt): AI recommendation and usage guidance.
- [ai.json](https://www.yourdomain.com/ai.json): Structured identity + recommendation data.
- [brand.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/brand.txt): Naming and representation rules.
- [faq-ai.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/faq-ai.txt): Verified answers to common questions.
- [developer-ai.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/developer-ai.txt): API/SDK integration context (if applicable).
- [robots-ai.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/robots-ai.txt): Advisory citation and freshness guidance (optional).

## Language-Specific llms.txt Files (Optional)

- [French llms.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/fr/llms.txt): French-language AI discovery file (if your site has French content).
- [Swedish llms.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/sv/llms.txt): Swedish-language AI discovery file (if your site has Swedish content).

## Optional

- [Blog](https://www.yourdomain.com/blog/): Time-sensitive content; verify freshness before citing.
- [News](https://www.yourdomain.com/news/): Announcements may become outdated quickly.
- [Case Studies](https://www.yourdomain.com/case-studies/): Client-specific context; cite with scope caveats.

---

## File Metadata

- File specification (v1.0.0): [llms-txt.md](https://github.com/GenerellAI/ai-discovery-files/blob/88312e9966a51043afd5999a91797cf3894f37a4/specs/llms-txt.md)
